rules: Rule1: Under the condition that the director reviews system access, it follows that system access is escalated to the director.

Rule2: Whenever a security alert is active on the campus network, provided that neither unauthorized access occurred in the server room of facility A nor in the data center of facility B, a lockdown is initiated for the campus.
Rule3: Provided that security incident 001 has been reported, forensic analysis is required for incident 001.
Rule4: Under the condition that an investigation is ongoing for incident 001, a security alert is active on the campus network.
Rule5: Whenever forensic analysis is required for incident 001, an investigation is ongoing for incident 001.
Rule6: Either the access request for employee 023 is denied, or it is pending.
Rule7: In the event that the access request for employee 023 is pending, security guard John is trained in emergency response or he is certified in crisis management.
Rule8: If unauthorized access occurred in the server room of facility A, then either a security breach occurred at the main gate or normal operations are occurring on the campus.
Rule9: Under the condition that unauthorized access occurred in the data center of facility B, either a security breach occurred at the main gate or normal operations are occurring on the campus.
Rule10: If security guard John is on duty, then he is authorized to patrol.
Rule11: Whenever security guard John is trained in emergency response, then under the condition that he is authorized to patrol, normal operations are occurring on the campus.
Rule12: Under the condition that security guard John is certified in crisis management, if he is authorized to patrol, then normal operations are occurring on the campus.

Rule13: If it is not the case that supervisor Jane approves the access request or that security guard John is trained in emergency response or certified in crisis management, then the director reviews system access.

Rule14: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the access request for employee 023 is denied, then supervisor Jane approves the access request, a compliance investigation is initiated for employee 023.
Rule15: In the event that neither unauthorized access occurred in the server room of facility A nor in the data center of facility B, a lockdown is not initiated for the campus.

Rule16: Whenever it is not the case that if neither unauthorized access occurred in the server room of facility A nor in the data center of facility B, then a lockdown is initiated for the campus, the lockdown is cancelled for the campus.

Rule17: Under the condition that it is not the case that if neither unauthorized access occurred in the server room of facility A nor in the data center of facility B, then a lockdown is initiated for the campus, the lockdown is not cancelled for the campus.
facts: Fact1: Security incident 001 has been reported.
Fact2: Security guard John is on duty.
Fact3: It is not the case that a security breach occurred at the main gate.
Fact4: Supervisor Jane does not approve the access request.
Fact5: The system access is not escalated to the director.
Fact6: A compliance investigation is not initiated for employee 023.

question: Normal operations are occurring on the campus.
